COMMENTS: Description of datasets available for CMCT comparisons

ers2-cmctnc-wgselev-ant.desc: ers2 elevations, WGS84 ellipsoid, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

ers2-cmctnc-egmmtelev-ant.desc: ers2 GLAS elevations, EGM08 mean-tide, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

ers2-cmctnc-egmtfelev-ant.desc: ers2 GLAS elevations, EGM08 tide-free, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF
